  3. Jenkins

    In this tutorial I will cover how to setup an Jenkins environment using docker. It will focus on a scenario where Nginx serves Jenkins app. This using the latest updates to docker network. We will make use of the autocreated bridge network that generates hostnames inside docker. This will let us serve internal host and port so we can upstream in nginx and we only need to expose nginxâ€™s external port. Having nginx in place also let us adapt our scenarios if we need to use SSL certificates. …
